title: Клякса
author: Fudzita Alyona
description: This artpiece is done with oil on canvas. 'Blot' is related to realism being a representative of animalistic genre. A playful little kitten is an important semantic detail of the work. After all, a cat is considered to be one of the best antidepressants posessing such qualities as being graceful, gentle, the embodiment of comfort - and, on the other hand, a repository of vices: lustful, lazy, impudent...
